question: What is the main purpose of setting up the Madhubabu Aain Sahayata Kendra?
option1: To provide free legal aid services to poor people
option2: To provide free essential commodities to the poor
option3: To provide free transport facility to farmers
answer: To provide free legal aid services to poor people
explanation: This scheme is named after great Odiya Lawyer Madhu babu. The main purpose of setting up the Madhubabu Aain Sahayata Kendra is to provide free legal aid services to financially weak poor people of the rural areas of the state.
